sentences.english: When that lawn mower cuts off your toes, don't come running to me.
sentences.chinese: 当割草机切下你的脚趾头的时候，你别跑来找我。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson: Bre you using you mower thellos afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊师长教师今全国午你筹办用割草机吗？

sentences.english: If you want to use our strimmer, please feel free to borrow it. We just bought a new one.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要用割草机，尽管说话，我家刚买了一个新的。

sentences.english: The mower should be stored upright as tilting the mower may cause oil leaks.
sentences.chinese: 割草机应直立存放，因为倾斜可造成漏油。

sentences.english: You know that I make it a rule never to let it go out of my garden.
sentences.chinese: 你知道我订了一条规矩，从不让割草机出我的花园。

sentences.english: The faulty lawn mower chewed the grass up.
sentences.chinese: 那台有毛病的割草机把草坪弄坏了。

sentences.english: They put it as “A lot cuter to watch than lawn mowers.”
sentences.chinese: 他们称之为“比割草机看起来可爱多了。”

sentences.english: Riding mower is a kind of miniature machine, which can be driven by one person.
sentences.chinese: 座骑式割草机属于单人驾驶小型工程机械。

sentences.english: I borrowed a mower from my neighbor to cut grass in my garden.
sentences.chinese: 那借了割草机来割花园里的草。
I1050幼兽队少年割草机甲板部分。

sentences.english: And it possessed all the glamour of a souped-up lawnmower .
sentences.chinese: 而且它拥有一辆马力增强版割草机的所有魅力。

sentences.english: The faulty lawn-mower chewed the grass up.
sentences.chinese: 那架有毛病的割草机把草地弄坏了。

sentences.english: What are Lawn Mower Starter Pawls?
sentences.chinese: 什么是割草机起动棘爪？。

sentences.english: This grass-cutting machines is driven by a small electric motor.
sentences.chinese: 这部割草机是由一个小电动马达推动的。

sentences.english: Women use garages to parke their cars and to store their lawnmowers.
sentences.chinese: 女人用车库存车或储藏她们的割草机。

sentences.english: Do not cover the mower with impermeable materials- such as plastic sheets.
sentences.chinese: 不要用塑料布等不透水材料覆盖割草机。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
